privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Bloomio ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content:
We may collect the following information:
• Access logs (IP address, browser information, access time, etc.)
• Cookie information
• Information provided through contact forms

usage.title: 2. How We Use Information
usage.content:
We use collected information for:
• Service improvement and optimization
• Access analytics
• Responding to inquiries

thirdParty.title: 3. Third-Party Disclosure
thirdParty.content: We do not share personal information with third parties without user consent, except as required by law.

analytics.title: 4. Analytics Tools
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics for access analysis. Google Analytics uses cookies for data collection.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve user experience. Cookies can be disabled in browser settings.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: For inquiries regarding this Privacy Policy, please use the contact form on our website.

copyright.content: Content on the Site is owned by us or rights holders. Unauthorized reproduction or copying is prohibited.

prohibition.content:
